description: Detects the modification of the registry settings used for Internet Explorer and other Windows components that use these settings
name: Modification of IE Registry Settings
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Internet\ Settings*) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD*) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:("Cookie\:" OR "Visited\:" OR "\(Empty\)")) OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Cache* OR *\\ZoneMap* OR *\\WpadDecision*)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:"Binary\ Data"))))
author: frack113
